description: The project seeks to improve the mental health condition of Palestinian men and women through improving the access to mental health facilities, developing capacity of mental health care staff and improving the quality of services.

subproject.corporate outcome: Expansion and access to financial services for the poor, employment and income generation and access to markets, goods and services.
subproject.description: The objective of the project is to improve mental health services infrastructures and capacities in the West Bank and Gaza Strip, through the construction, equipping and operations of three community mental heath centers in Jenin, Hebron and Nablus and one Documentation Centre in Ramallah, training and operations of 19-newly recruited staff, conducting three cycles of 12 short training sessions for general practitioners and nurses. Moreover, raise the awareness of public through anti stigma campaigns in different cities of the West Bank.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: AFD Mental Health
